member.name: T:Npgsql.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Extension method for setting up Npgsql OpenTelemetry tracing.

member.name: M:Npgsql.TracerProviderBuilderExtensions.AddNpgsql(OpenTelemetry.Trace.TracerProviderBuilder,System.Action{Npgsql.NpgsqlTracingOptions})
member.summary: Subscribes to the Npgsql activity source to enable OpenTelemetry tracing.
